english.segment1: I wanna go down. Sweet come around. Don't ask me where. I'm going there
english.segment2: I will always cover. You will always wonder
english.segment3: Sick of it all. You make me feel so small. Better off dead. Before you forget
english.segment4: I wanna cover now baby. Don't wanna forget. Don't make me wonder baby. Just get something so sweet
english.segment5: I wanna go down. Sweet come around. Better off gone. It won't be too long.
